PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04032018-04-03,  ,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectAmendment to the Convention on Environmental Impact Assessment in a Transboundary Context, adopted at Sofia on 27 February 2001, and the Amendment to the Convention on Environmental Impact Assessment in a Transboundary Context, adopted at Cavtat on 4 June 2004
PrecisOrder Authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to BRING INTO FORCE for Canada, the AMENDMENT to the CONVENTION on Environmental Impact Assessment in a Transboundary Context, adopted at Sofia on 27 February 2001, and the AMENDMENT to the CONVENTION on Environmental Impact Assessment in a Transboundary Context, adopted at Cavtat on 4 June 2004.
AttachmentsAttachment
